testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.Offline_Document
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User has logged in successfully.

Test Scenario 1:Create Offline Document Click on the Refresh button Expand a cabinet Expand a drawer select a folder Document open Successfully Select Document checkbox from Thumbnail Click on Offline page menu option Click on Document offline message ok button Document Created successfully and send to Offline

Test Scenario 2:Open Offline Doc Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Mousehover to Recent Tab Click on Recent Folder Document page open succesfully this message should show this message should show Document Is in Offline message showing succesfully open document in View only mode Document page Close succesfully

Test Scenario 3:Sync New Document on Offline Doc Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Click on Username Click on Offline Document option Document showing Succesfully under Offline page and select offline document New document sync successfully

Test Scenario 4: Release Offline Doc Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Click on Username Click on Offline Document option Select Offline Document page Click on Release option and Document Release succesfully Mousehover to Recent Tab Click on Recent Folder Document open Successfully Document Release successfully Click on Refresh button
